title: Develop a Change Management Plan
description: For a major technology implementation project, an agent must draft a change management plan.

tasks.description: Identify key stakeholder groups that will be affected by the change (e.g., 'Sales Team', 'IT Department', 'Executives').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists the relevant stakeholder groups.

tasks.description: Draft a communication plan outlining what messages need to be sent to which groups and when.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a structured communication plan.

tasks.description: Outline a training plan, including different training modules for different user groups.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-level training plan.
